event.title: centuries the town was generally known

data.event: During the 17th and 18th centuries the town was generally known by the name of Darnton.
Built in 1183, the Grade I listed St Cuthbert's Church is one of the most important early English churches in the north of England.
However the oldest church in the town happens to be that of St Andrew's Church built around 1125 and presides in the Haughton area of Darlington.
